article_title: Ben Carson’s proposed health care overhaul is a head-scratcher
article_text:
Retired neurosurgeon wants to dramatically change the U.S. health care system

He wants government-funded health savings accounts for everyone

The devil’s in the details, and the details are lacking

article_metadata.title: Ben Carson’s proposed health care overhaul is a head-scratcher | McClatchy DC

og.description: Ben Carson’s rise to Republican presidential front-runner has come without serious scrutiny of his domestic policy proposals.
